titlestmt.titleproper: A Guide to the Winthrop Rockefeller papers FA441

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2015-08-26 18:05:03 -0400.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The Winthrop Rockefeller papers are arranged in 10 record groups.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Record Group 7 Audio-Visual materials; Record Group 8 Arkansas Gazette and Democrat, and Record Group 9 Memorabilia are not available on microfilm, and are therefore not available at Rockefeller Archive Center.

originalsloc.head: Existence and Location of Originals
originalsloc.p: The original collection is available at the University of Arkansas Little Rock.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Information regarding the Rockefeller Archive Center's preferred elements and forms of citation can be found at http://www.rockarch.org/research/citations.php

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Winthrop Rockefeller papers are open to scholarly research, with select materials restricted. The archival material is only available at RAC as microfilm. User copies of the microfilm are available for scholarly access.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Including Winthrop Rockefeller's personal correspondence of approximately 300,000 items.

otherfindaid.head: Other Finding Aids

p.extref: A PDF of Record Group 1 is available.

otherfindaid.p: Accuracy and completeness of the contents listed has not been verified in relation to the microfilm available at RAC.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Including Winthrop Rockefeller's 1720 Tower Building and other office files.

otherfindaid.head: Other Finding Aids

p.extref: A PDF of Record Group 2 is available.

otherfindaid.p: Accuracy and completeness of the contents listed has not been verified in relation to the microfilm available at RAC.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Files pertaining to all aspects of Winthrop Rockefeller's administration, containing approximately 430,000 items.

otherfindaid.head: Other Finding Aids

p.extref: A PDF of Record Group 3 is available.

otherfindaid.p: Accuracy and completeness of the contents listed has not been verified in relation to the microfilm available at RAC.

did.unittitle: Press, Public Relations and Political files

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Including but not limited to: press clippings, research files and published papers.

otherfindaid.head: Other Finding Aids

p.extref: A PDF of Record Group 4 is available.

otherfindaid.p: Accuracy and completeness of the contents listed has not been verified in relation to the microfilm available at RAC.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Winthrop Rockefeller's files concerning Winrock Enterprises, containing approximately 6,000 items.

otherfindaid.head: Other Finding Aids

p.extref: A PDF of Record Group 5 is available.

otherfindaid.p: Accuracy and completeness of the contents listed has not been verified in relation to the microfilm available at RAC.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Winthrop Rockefeller's files on Winrock Farms, containing approximately 26,000 items.

otherfindaid.head: Other Finding Aids

p.extref: A PDF of Record Group 6 is available.

otherfindaid.p: Accuracy and completeness of the contents listed has not been verified in relation to the microfilm available at RAC.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Primarily documenting Jeannette E. Rockefeller's activities with mental hygiene agencies. Contains approximately 20,000 items.

otherfindaid.head: Other Finding Aids

p.extref: A PDF of Record Group 10 is available.

otherfindaid.p: Accuracy and completeness of the contents listed has not been verified in relation to the microfilm available at RAC.
